name: structKeyList
description: Extracts keys from a CFML structure.

params.name: structure
params.description: Structure from which to extract a list of keys

params.name: delimiter
params.description: Character that separates keys in list. Default: comma.

examples.title: Using Custom Delimiter
examples.description: Retrieve a pipe separated list of keys

examples.title: Using Member Function
examples.description: CF11+ Lucee4.5+ Retrieve a comma separated list of keys using the member function
